settings.text:
We're Here to Help!

At Underground Cellar, we're more than just a wine company – we're a small team of passionate people based in the heart of Sonoma wine country, ready to provide you with a premium experience every step of the way. Whether you're looking for answers, need assistance with your order, or just want to know more about our wines, we’re here for you.

We pride ourselves on offering a white glove service, ensuring that every customer feels valued and cared for. No question is too big or small – your satisfaction is our top priority.

Our support team is available Monday - Friday to assist with any inquiries you may have. If you’d prefer to chat, let us know in your email, and we'd be happy to schedule a call!

For assistance, email us at:

support@undergroundcellar.com

If you are a winery interested in featuring your wine on Underground Cellar, reach out to us at: featured@undergroundcellar.com

We're here to help and look forward to connecting with you!
